DOC.brief_summary: Patients Multiple Myeloma undergo single timepoint Positron Emission Tomography image intravenously inject C11 Methionine detect viable lesion .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Multiple Myeloma symptomatic bone soft tissue disease Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group status 0 2 Life expectance > = 12 week Ability understand willingness sign inform consent Tissue sample genotype data plan within 3 month C11 positron emission tomography ( PET ) image Pregnant breast feeding Claustrophobic reaction unable lie still bed inside PET scanner 60 minute Research related radiation exposure exceed 50 millisieverts
